fields.headline: Why we're watching … Natalia Tena
fields.bodyText: Where do I know her from? Over 30? She was that gothy girl Nicholas Hoult had a crush on in About a Boy in 2002 when she was 15. Under 30? Nymphadora Tonks out of Harry Potter. Ah yes. Her. Hello! She's currently knee-deep in the filming of the second series of HBO's raunchy medieval drama Game of Thrones. And then next year she's starring opposite Robert Pattinson in Bel Ami. You'll see her in cinemas now though as the star of You Instead, the story of two feuding rock stars who get handcuffed together at a festival and, yes, fall in love. She does look "music-ey", doesn't she? Correct! She's the singer stroke accordion player in Molotov Jukebox – a "gypsy, funk, flamenco, ska band" (her description). She says: "I need both music and acting to even think about surviving life. I don't have a choice." We say: She's this year's double threat. If beautiful actors and flamenco accordion players threaten you. You Instead is in cinemas now
